蝖字的基本解释

蝖
xuān
〔蝖螜（
飞：“蝖飞蠕动，各乐其性”。h?）〕即“蛴螬”，金龟子的幼虫。

蝖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuān］
［《廣韻》況袁切，平元，曉。］
虫飞貌。

蝖字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝖； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1089第12
【集韻】許元切，音萱。【玉篇】蠀螬也。【揚子·方言】蠀螬，或謂之蝖?。【郭註】亦呼當齊，或呼地蠶，或呼蟦蝖。【韓詩·外傳】蝖飛蠕動，各樂其性。

蝖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蝖字的起名意思

暂无。

Beetle
Basic explanation of words
Beetle
xuān
〔蝖螜（
Fei: "Flying worms are squirming, and each is happy." h?)] is the "grub", the larva of the beetle.
Beetle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuān］
["Guang Yun" Kuang Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, Xiao. ]
Insect fly appearance.
Beetle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝖; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1089-12
[Ji Yun] Xu Yuanqie, Yin Xuan. [Jade articles] Li Li also. 【Yangtze Dialect】The scorpion, or called the scorpion?. [Guo's Note] Also call Dangqi, or call the silkworm, or call the panworm. [Han Poetry·Said Biography] Turtles flew and squirmed, each with his own pleasure.
